## [33] jsonlite_1.8.0# Imported (Basic) Modules in Python 
allmodules = [v.__name__ for k, v in globals().items() 
    if type(v) is types.ModuleType and not k.startswith('__')]

len(allmodules)
## 7
", ".join(allmodules)
## 'sys, os, pip, copy, types, pandas, numpy'
